name: MiniKnight: Yara
description:
Controls : 

↑ (W) ← (A) ↓ (S) → (D) [QWERTY]   OR    ↑ (Z) ← (Q) ↓ (S) → (D) [AZERTY]

Sword Slash (Left Click) -  Dash (Right Click) - Magic Slash (Every 3rd Sword Slash)

Resources collected ingame, increase your stats like health, mana, mana regen and damage!

FEATURES

-Dynamic combat system

-Plenty of stuff to destroy

-Randomly generated world 

-(Will you find the unusual gift?)

-Epic Boss battle to save Christmas
